modName: CuteRosy - Very Beautiful Follower also Marriageable - Amazing
summary: This Mod Will Add A New Npc / Follower / Marriageable Npc To Skyrim. She Is Very Beautiful Which I am Sure Everyone will Love! Worth Checking Out! trust me!
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What Will this Mod add? 
- A New Female Npc/Follower Also Marriageable - Very Beautifully Made Npc . 
- Here Name Is CuteRosy And you Will Find Her Working At DragonsReach In A Room Near The Mage Guy.
- She Also Is A Mage Character. But She Would Not Mind If you give her A Sword.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mod Requirements 
-> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21298 - TurndownX Race* Important.
-> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168 - Apachii - U will Need IMPORTANT - > You Will need Main File AND ApachiiSkyhairFemale v 1.0 (very Important)
U Will find v 1.0 In the Optional files Of His Awesome Mod. Thanks!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future - Now That I Finally Understood How i Make Such Awesome Mods I Will Be Making ALOT so make Sure U Friend me :3
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I Do Not Allow Copying On My Mod. If you Are to do this Please, Contact me Or Give Me Credit.
Thanks.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits To
-> JackGa For The Awesome TurndownX Race!
-> Apachii For His Amazing Hair Models
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Last Words. 
If you Do NOT like this Mod. Dude Do not be a hate. Simply Click The Back Button On Your Top Left Screen.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
